info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WITH EMBEDDED SNOW SQUALLS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF FULTON...HERKIMER...HAMILTON...AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of snow showers with embedded snow squalls accompanied by winds of up to 45 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. Precipitation may begin as rain in lower elevations before quickly changing to snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 841 PM EDT, snow showers with embedded snow squalls were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Lake Eaton Campground to near Lake Pleasant to near Springfield and moving east at 35 MPH. THESE SNOW SHOWERS AND SNOW SQUALLS WILL BE NEAR... Lake Pleasant and Moffitt Beach Campground around 845 PM EDT. Wells, Ames and Sacandaga Campground around 900 PM EDT. Day Center around 925 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 30. Interstate 87 near exit 26. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through these snow showers and snow squalls. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
